[[Tirana derby II]]
[[Communist Albania derby]] | image = | caption = Derbys between [[KF Tirana|Tirana]], [[Dinamo Tirana|Dinamo]] and [[Partizani Tirana|Partizani]] | city or region = [[Tirana]],
{{flag|Albania}} | first contested = | teams involved = [[KF Tirana]]
[[Dinamo Tirana]]
[[Partizani Tirana]] | most wins = | most player appearances = | mostrecent = | nextmeeting = | total = | league = | series = | regularseason = | postseason = | largestvictory = [[KF Tirana]] 6-0 [[Dinamo Tirana]] }} The term '''Tirana derby''' refers to the [[local derby|local derbies]] in [[Tirana]] played between two of the three professional [[association football|football]] clubs [[KF Tirana]], [[Dinamo Tirana|Dinamo]] or [[Partizani Tirana|Partizani]]. It specifically refers to individual matches between the clubs, but can also be used to describe the general ongoing rivalry between the clubs, players and / or fans. Tirana is the only city in the [[Albania]] hosting three professional football clubs. The only other Albanian city to host more than one professional football club is [[Vlora]], home of [[Flamurtari VlorÃ«|Flamurtari]] and [[KF Vlora]]. However, the two Vlora clubs hardly play head-to-head due to KF Vlora's common lower division status. ==Derbys== The following derbys are part of the Tirana Derby: *[[Tirana derby I]] - Derby between [[KF Tirana]] and [[Partizani Tirana]] *[[Tirana derby II]] - Derby between [[KF Tirana]] and [[Dinamo Tirana]] *[[Communist Albania derby]] or Tirana derby III Derby between [[Dinamo Tirana]] and [[Partizani Tirana]] ===Tirana derby I=== {{main|Tirana derby I}} {{Expand section|date=November 2010}} ===Tirana derby II=== {{main|Tirana derby II}} {{Expand section|date=November 2010}} ===Communist Albania derby=== {{main|Communist Albania derby}} {{Expand section|date=November 2010}} ==References== {{Reflist|2}} ==External links== *[http://www.footballderbies.com/ FootballDerbies.com] [[Category:Association football rivalries]] [[Category:Football in Albania]] {{Albania-sport-stub}}
